Camoflage::

She slept restlessly at the base of the old tree stump.  She was 
dreaming of a home that no longer existed.  Her home planet of 
Kapaflax was once like Cybertron. Made of metal and home to billions 
of bots. Then the plague came.  Now all that was left was a rust 
cloud that floated about in space.  She was put into a pod and 
evacuated from the planet by her parents before the plague could get 
to her.  She was 5 when she was put into the pod.  Now she was 9 
years old.  She slept and dreamed of times gone by. She muttered in 
her sleep, "Yes Mommy, I'll get Daddy to fix the subspace 
entertainment connection. The Heavily Injured Bots Emergency Bay is 
on tonight. It should be a good one tonight."  She rolled over in 
her sleep and smiled.
